input-tag.name: Text Input Tag
input-tag.code: <input type="text" id="name" name="name" placeholder="Your hint here">

file-input-tag.name: File Input Tag
file-input-tag.code: <input type="file" id="name" name="name" placeholder="Your hint here">

number-input-tag.name: Number Input Tag
number-input-tag.code: <input type="number" id="name" name="name" placeholder="Your hint here">

select-tag.name: Select Tag
select-tag.code:
<select name="fruits" id="fruits">
  <option value="volvo">Volvo</option>
  <option value="saab">Saab</option>
  <option value="mercedes">Mercedes</option>
  <option value="audi">Audi</option>
</select>

simple-form.name: Form Tag
